id.description: The unique identifier of that manga.

title.description: The display title of the manga whose scans are to be downloaded.

single_pages.description: A list of template URLs pointing to the image files to download. If a template fails to load, a new attempt to load an image using the next template will be made, until one is successful or all failed.

items.description: An URL pointing to a single page. This may contain special sequences of characters used to mark the position of chapter ($c) and page ($p) numbers.

double_pages.description: Same as 'single_page' but optimized for cases where the loaded image is a double-page, which is basically two pages in one.

items.description: An URL pointing to a double-page. This may contain special sequences of characters used to mark the position of chapters ($c) and page ($p, $q) numbers.

start_page.description: The number of the first page for this source. Some sites starts at 0, while others may start at 1.
